metadata.description: The base URI where artifacts required by this template are located. When the template is deployed using the accompanying scripts, a private location in the subscription will be used and this value will be automatically generated.

The sasToken required to access _artifactsLocation.  When the template is deployed using the accompanying scripts, a sasToken will be automatically generated. Use the defaultValue if the staging location is not secured.
Accessible port of the LDAP server.
The LDAP server host.
SSH Key or password for the Virtual Machine. SSH key is recommended.
User name for the Virtual Machine.
Admin Server hosting VM name.
Type of authentication to use on the Virtual Machine. SSH key is recommended.
One of the supported database types
Password for Database
Userid of Database
Set 'true' to deny public inbound traffic for the admin server.
Unique DNS Name for the Public IP used to access the Virtual Machine.
Azure DNS Zone name.
Name of the resource group containing the Azure DNS Zone.
Specify a label used to generate subdomain of Oracle WebLogic Administration Console. The final subdomain name will be label.dnszoneName, e.g. console.contoso.xyz
Specify a label used to generate subdomain of Application Gateway. The final subdomain name will be label.dnszoneName, e.g. applications.contoso.xyz
JDBC Connection String
Initial Number of Managed Servers that will be configured in the Dynamic Cluster
Endpoint of the Elasticsearch instance.
The credentials to distibute message with REST API to Elasticsearch instance.
The credentials to distibute message with REST API to Elasticsearch instance.
Bool value, if it's set to true, will enable Azure Active Directory after WebLogic Server starts.
If true, create Coherence cluster with data tier for cache.
If true, use the supplied parameters to configure custome DNS.
Specifies whether Local Storage is enabled for the Coherence*Web cluster tier.
If true, use the supplied parameters to connect the cluster to a pre-provisioned database.
If true, use the supplied parameters to distribute WebLogic Server logs to the Elasticsearch instance.
Bool value, if it's set to true, it will setup OHS and configures for WebLogic Server cluster
If true, the template will update records to the existing DNS Zone. If false, the template will create a new DNS Zone.
